snippet: The advance came in a remote region that aid groups say is becoming a war zone.
abstract: Boko Haram militants are driven back into Nigeria by Cameroonian forces, after attack on village in northern Cameroon that left eight people dead.
lead_paragraph: The advance came in a remote region that aid groups say is becoming a war zone.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Cameroon: Army Drives Insurgents Back to Nigeria
headline.main: Cameroon: Army Drives Insurgents Back to Nigeria
